divs: sighting detailson september, 26th i was out for a walk around 00h30 because i couldn't sleep. i was at the top of a hill in the park by my house and i noticed a bright white\red light in the sky that was in the direction of my house. at first i thought nothing of it because i often seen planes and satellites around my area. but when i realized the speed that it was travelling i started to wonder if it could be a ufo. i sat down on some bleachers and just watched the object. it continued in a straight path with an eastward direction; it continued in this path for about a minute. after about a minute it stopped abruptly and started to ascend. it was ascending for about a minute then it vanished. this is not the first time i have seen an object with similar characteristics. two weeks prior to this i saw an object that was similar. it was hovering for a moment, started to ascend and then it vanished. there is one other occasion where i can remember seeing an object like this, i was much younger (around 10 or 11) and i was sitting in my families hottub. in between two trees i saw a light travelling in my direction the it stopped i looked away for just a second and when i redirected my attention back to the area that i saw it, it had vanished.
Summary: I was walking in the park by my house when I saw a bright red/white light.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Barrie
There were no other sightings in Barrie on or around September 26th 2013
